name: OgreDuo - The Trial of Roggregor
description:
Roger and Gregor - known collectively as Roggregor - is… are an Ogre… Ogres. As you can tell already, things aren’t simple for Ogres, a humanoid species with two heads. To make life even more complicated, Ogres have to pass a coming of age ritual when they reach their Second Adulthood. The rite takes place in the Temple of Gorgor at the first full moon of the summer. Among other members of their tribe, it is Roggregor’s time to take part in this ceremony.

Made for GGJ22 by:

Gábor Zelei - level design / story / concept / sound selection
Luis Laczky - 3d models / 2d gui / animations / logo
Robert Kovacs - programmer / level design / testing
Viktor Hubert - programmer / sound& music selection / testing

Temple assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/cartoon-t...
Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
Music from https://freesound.org/
